info.name: Dark FenixEDU - IST
info.description: A simple dark style for FenixEDU
info.additionalInfo: Changelog ----------------- - 0.2.0: More vars. Small tweaks. - 0.1.4: Change .img-thumbnail's background and border colors - 0.1.3: Fix hr and .badge coloring + tweak .rsslink positioning - 0.1.2: Fix an issue with coloring a quirky stray td - 0.1.1: Update websites the style applies to - 0.1.0: First version ever
